ygData.subject: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone! I saw other people writing introductions and thought What the heck! I m a 28 year old male living in the Midwest.  I ve had a partner for
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone!

I saw other people writing introductions and thought "What the heck!"

I'm a 28 year old male living in the Midwest. I've had a partner for close to
6 years. We will be moving to Connecticut in August for a company move. I am
a computer programmer for a teleservices company.

I have to say it's refreshing to be able to communicate with like minded
individuals about a game that I adore. I only play one character - Sonderac,
High Elf Wizard (Karana Server). It's a power thing, I want to get to level 50
and float around having everyone be jealous =P~. I did notice that most people
who have responded so far are in a computer related field, pattern or
coincidence? : )

I have a small group of about 12 - 13 friends I hunt with online. I've had to
come out to two of the ladies, they started to "fall" for me (or so they say).
So I decided instead of rejection I'd just tell them the truth. It hasn't
changed much, I can /tell them joking about more stuff now. I don't go running
around chasing cute Barbarians or making blatant fashion statements. (although
I think about both) : ) : )

I enjoy life, and think that it should be lived day to day with joy and
happiness. I destroy anyone who tries to interfere with that goal. ;->

If anyone is on the Karana server don't be afraid to give me a /tell, I don't
bite (unless paid) : ) : )

I hope everyone is doing well in the game and out. Safe travels and happiness.

Scotty

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through Internet Express's WebMail: http://webmail.netexpress.net
